text: Pustelnik is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Marciszów, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately north-east of Marciszów, north of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. == Gallery == File:Pustelnik (województwo dolnośląskie) (001).jpg File:Pustelnik (województwo dolnośląskie) (003).jpg File:Pustelnik, pohled do krajiny.jpg ==References== Pustelnik
title: Pustelnik, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
